item.description:
A change in the schedule for this event
We will start by gathering at the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum at 1:30pm. The museum, designed as an homage to a 15th century Venetian Palazzo, houses an spectacular collection of art surrounding a beautiful and serene courtyard. Even better, is that New Year's Day admission is free(!).

http://www.gardnermus...

After some time at the museum, we can re-group at 4:00pm at Fire and Ice in the Back Bay.. Fire and Ice is a fun and unusual food experience.

http://www.fire-ice.c...


Feel free to join us for one or both portions of this event.

1:30pm: Gardner Museum

4:00pm: Fire and Ice



After that-- what would you like to suggest? It's New Year's Day and the possibilites in the Boston are limitless......
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting at the gate

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Happy New Year 2011--Fire and Ice and the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
